languages.text: "Мастер плоти достаточно безумен, чтобы помочь нам бежать в угоду собственным темным интригам. Но цена, элантах.. будет ужасной и несправедливой".
"The flesh master is mad enough to help us escape in favour of his own unholy designs. But the price, elantach, will be unfair and terrible."
languages.original_text: "Мастер плоти достаточно безумен, чтобы помочь нам бежать в угоду собственным темным интригам. Но цена, элантах.. будет ужасной и несправедливой".

traits.locale_text: "The flesh master is mad enough to help us escape in favour of his own unholy designs. But the price, elantach, will be unfair and terrible."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「肉体の支配者は、自分の邪悪な計画のために、私たちを逃がす手助けをするほど狂っている。だけど、その代償は、不公平で恐ろしいものになるでしょうね、エランタ」
languages.original_text: "The flesh master is mad enough to help us escape in favour of his own unholy designs. But the price, elantach, will be unfair and terrible."

traits.locale_text: 「肉体の支配者は、自分の邪悪な計画のために、私たちを逃がす手助けをするほど狂っている。だけど、その代償は、不公平で恐ろしいものになるでしょうね、エランタ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “血肉大师愿意帮助我们逃跑，以此实现他邪恶的计划，他的脑子真的疯得很厉害。不过，外界人，我们恐怕要付出极其可怕的代价。”
languages.original_text: "The flesh master is mad enough to help us escape in favour of his own unholy designs. But the price, elantach, will be unfair and terrible."

traits.locale_text: “血肉大师愿意帮助我们逃跑，以此实现他邪恶的计划，他的脑子真的疯得很厉害。不过，外界人，我们恐怕要付出极其可怕的代价。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «El señor de la carne está tan loco como para ayudarnos a escapar en favor de sus propios designios impíos. Pero el precio, elantach, será injusto y terrible».
languages.original_text: "The flesh master is mad enough to help us escape in favour of his own unholy designs. But the price, elantach, will be unfair and terrible."

traits.locale_text: «El señor de la carne está tan loco como para ayudarnos a escapar en favor de sus propios designios impíos. Pero el precio, elantach, será injusto y terrible».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Der Fleischmeister ist verrückt genug, uns zum Wohle seiner eigenen unheiligen Pläne zur Flucht zu verhelfen. Doch der Preis, Elantach, wird ungerecht und grauenhaft sein."
languages.original_text: "The flesh master is mad enough to help us escape in favour of his own unholy designs. But the price, elantach, will be unfair and terrible."

traits.locale_text: "Der Fleischmeister ist verrückt genug, uns zum Wohle seiner eigenen unheiligen Pläne zur Flucht zu verhelfen. Doch der Preis, Elantach, wird ungerecht und grauenhaft sein."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Le maître de la chair est assez fou pour nous aider à nous enfuir, si tant est que ça serve ses desseins. Mais le prix qu'il nous faudra payer, elantach, sera exorbitant et probablement épouvantable. »
languages.original_text: "The flesh master is mad enough to help us escape in favour of his own unholy designs. But the price, elantach, will be unfair and terrible."

traits.locale_text: « Le maître de la chair est assez fou pour nous aider à nous enfuir, si tant est que ça serve ses desseins. Mais le prix qu'il nous faudra payer, elantach, sera exorbitant et probablement épouvantable. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Et üstadı, kendi habis amaçlarına ulaşması hâlinde kaçmamıza yardım edecek kadar deli gerçekten. Fakat bunun bedeli insafsız ve korkunç olur elantach."
languages.original_text: "The flesh master is mad enough to help us escape in favour of his own unholy designs. But the price, elantach, will be unfair and terrible."

traits.locale_text: "Et üstadı, kendi habis amaçlarına ulaşmak için bize kaçmamızda yardım edebilecek kadar deli gerçekten. Ama insanfsız ve korkunç bir bedel karşılığında elantach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
